featured.title: Featured Products
featured.subtitle: Every product is strictly selected to present the purest quality and charm

brandStory.subtitle: OUR STORY
brandStory.title: Inheriting a Millennium
brandStory.description: Ya Yun Tea & Wine was founded in 1998, born from a deep love for traditional Chinese tea and wine culture. For over two decades, we have journeyed deep into Yunnan's tea mountains and Guizhou's wine cellars, seeking only the purest flavors, blending millennium-old craftsmanship with modern quality standards to present an unparalleled sensory experience for every noble connoisseur.

milestones.2008: Established Yunnan ancient tree tea base
milestones.2015: Obtained national-grade sauce-flavor liquor cooperation authorization

tea.title: Premium Tea Collection
tea.description: From aged Pu'er to fragrant Oolong, explore the profound heritage of Chinese tea culture

liquor.title: Fine Liquor Selection
liquor.description: A collection of Maotai and Luzhou aromas, savoring the mellow回味 of time-honored spirits

cultureTraceability.title: Traceability
cultureTraceability.description: Explore tea and wine culture, trace the origin of every product, understand the story of craftsmanship heritage
cultureTraceability.academyDescription: Professional video teaching, from beginner to master, leading you to appreciate the profound heritage of tea and wine culture
cultureTraceability.verifyDescription: Every product has a unique anti-counterfeit code and QR code, you can check the authenticity of the product at any time, understand the complete production chain of the product, from raw materials to finished products, every step has traceable data.
cultureTraceability.verifyLocation: Anti-counterfeit code is located on the inside of product packaging or on bottle label
cultureTraceability.originsDescription: Go deep into origins, visit the stories behind every tea mountain and every wine cellar

faq1.question: How do I place an order?
faq1.answer: You can browse our product catalog, select products you like and add them to your cart, then complete the checkout process following the instructions.

faq2.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq2.answer: We support Alipay, WeChat Pay, bank cards, Visa, Mastercard and many other payment methods.

faq3.question: How long does it take to ship my order?
faq3.answer: Generally, orders are shipped within 1-3 business days after payment confirmation. There may be delays during holidays.

faq4.question: How do I check shipping information?
faq4.answer: You can view shipping information on the order details page, we will notify you of shipping status updates via SMS and email.

faq5.question: Do you support returns?
faq5.answer: We support 7-day no-reason returns, please visit the return policy page for details.

contact.messageSent: Message sent successfully, we'll reply as soon as possible
contact.sendingFailed: Failed to send message, please try again

principles.title: Return Principles
principles.description: We are committed to providing you with the best shopping experience. If you are not satisfied with your purchased product, we support 7-day no-reason return service.
rules: Returns can be applied within 7 days from the date of receipt
Products must be kept in original packaging and unused
All accessories and gifts must be complete
Please provide purchase receipt or order number
Customized products do not support returns

supported.title: Supported Cases
items: Products with quality issues or damage
Products received do not match order description

notSupported.title: Unsupported Cases
items: Products have been used, washed or damaged
Customized products (such as engraving, special packaging)
Product damage due to personal reasons

steps.title: Apply for Return
steps.description: Log in to your account, go to order details page, click 'Apply for Return' button. Fill in return reason and related information, submit application.

steps.title: Wait for Approval
steps.description: Our customer service team will review your application within 1-2 business days. After approval, you will receive return confirmation email.

steps.title: Ship Back Product
steps.description: Ship the product back according to the address in the confirmation email. Please use reliable courier service and keep tracking number for tracking. Product must be carefully packaged to avoid damage during shipping.

steps.title: Product Inspection
steps.description: After receiving returned product, we will conduct inspection within 1-3 business days. If return conditions are met, refund or exchange will be processed immediately.

steps.title: Refund or Exchange
steps.description: Refund will be returned to your payment account within 7 business days. Exchange product will be reshipped within 1-3 business days after confirmation.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
rules: Refund will be returned to your payment account in the original way
Refund processing time is usually 7 business days
Refund amount does not include original order shipping fee (unless quality issue)
Return shipping fee is borne by buyer (unless quality issue)
If coupon was used, refund amount will deduct coupon value
Bank processing time may require additional 3-5 business days
After refund completion, you will receive confirmation email

notice.title: Notice
items: Return due to quality issue, return shipping fee borne by us
No-reason return, return shipping fee borne by buyer
Some products may apply special refund policy

exchangePolicy.title: Exchange Policy
rules: Support exchange of same product different specifications
Support exchange to other equivalent value products
Exchange product must be applied within 7 days
Exchange product must be kept in original packaging and unused
Price difference when exchanging will be refunded or supplemented
Exchange shipping fee borne by buyer (unless quality issue)
If exchange product out of stock, will assist with refund processing
exchangePolicy.note: Exchange process is same as return process, please select 'Exchange' option when applying.

qualityIssues.title: Quality Issue Handling
qualityIssues.description: If the product you received has quality issues, we will provide better return service for you.
rules: Return due to quality issue, return shipping fee borne by us
Exchange due to quality issue, free exchange shipping
Can apply for full refund (including original order shipping fee)
Provide product photos or videos as quality proof
Customer service will respond to quality complaint within 24 hours
Priority processing of quality issue return applications

definition.title: Quality Issue Definition
items: Product broken, deformed or has obvious defects
Product seriously does not match description
Product expired or spoiled (for food products)

specialProducts.title: Special Product Policy
specialProducts.description: Some products may have special return policies, please read carefully before purchasing.
rules: Customized products: Do not support returns, unless quality issue
Food products: Do not support returns after opening
Underwear: For hygiene reasons, do not support returns
Promotional products: May apply special return policy
Limited products: Do not support returns after sale
Virtual products: After purchase, do not support returns

returnAddress.title: Return Address
instructions: Please clearly mark 'Return' and order number on package
Recommended to use trackable courier service
Keep tracking number to track return progress
After product arrives, we will notify you via email

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: When applying for return, please prepare the following documents:
documents: Return application form (can be downloaded from order page)
Courier tracking number (provide after shipping product back)
requiredDocuments.note: Missing required documents may affect return processing time.

questions.a: From receiving returned product to completing refund or exchange, usually takes 7-10 business days. Quality issue applications will be prioritized.
No-reason return shipping fee borne by buyer. Quality issue return shipping fee borne by us.

questions.q: Can I return at physical store?
questions.a: Currently only supports online returns. If need to return at physical store, please contact customer service for consultation first.
Refund will be returned to your payment account in original way. If multiple payment methods used, refund will be proportional.
Yes. If order contains multiple products, can return only part. Refund amount will be calculated proportionally.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about return policy or need help processing return, please contact us:

tip.title: Tip
tip.content: To speed up processing, please provide order number, product information and return reason when contacting us. Our customer service team will serve you wholeheartedly.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
description: Welcome to Ya Yun Tea & Spirits website (hereinafter referred to as 'Website'). By accessing or using the Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as 'Terms').

If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Website. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and modified terms will take effect immediately upon posting on this website.
Continued use of the Website means you accept the modified Terms. We recommend that you regularly visit this page to learn about the latest Terms.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.description: Ya Yun Tea & Spirits is an online e-commerce platform providing sales services for tea, liquor and related products. We are committed to providing excellent shopping experience and professional products for users.
serviceDescription.note: We reserve the right to modify, suspend or terminate services at any time without prior notice.

userAccount.title: User Account
userAccount.description: To use certain features of the Website, you need to create an account. You agree to:
agreements: Provide accurate, complete and up-to-date information
Maintain and update your account information
Be responsible for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
restrictions: You must not share your account with others or use others' accounts.
If you discover any security vulnerabilities, please notify us immediately.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms or engage in any harmful behavior.

productInformation.title: Product Information
productInformation.description: We strive to ensure product information displayed on the Website is accurate. However, we do not guarantee that product descriptions, images or other content are completely accurate, complete, current or error-free.
disclaimers: Product prices may change at any time without notice
We reserve the right to stop selling any product at any time
Some products may have restrictions or cannot be delivered to certain regions
Product images are for reference only, actual products may vary slightly
We are not responsible for damage caused by inaccurate product information

ordersAndPayment.title: Orders and Payment
ordersAndPayment.description: By placing an order on this Website, you agree to purchase the listed products and pay applicable fees and taxes.
terms: All prices are displayed in Chinese Yuan (CNY)
We reserve the right to cancel any order before shipping
After order confirmation, we will send confirmation information via email
After payment completion, order is considered valid
We support multiple payment methods, including Alipay, WeChat Pay, etc.
All payment transactions are processed through secure third-party payment gateways
ordersAndPayment.note: If we cannot complete your order, we will notify you and refund the paid amount.

shippingAndDelivery.title: Shipping and Delivery
shippingAndDelivery.description: We provide nationwide delivery services. Delivery time and fees may vary by region and product.
terms: Orders are usually processed within 1-3 business days
Delivery time depends on your location and shipping company
We use reliable third-party logistics partners
You can track your order through order details page
Some remote areas may require additional delivery time
Signature required upon delivery
shippingAndDelivery.note: If product is damaged or lost during shipping, please contact our customer service team.

returnPolicy.title: Return Policy
returnPolicy.description: We hope you are satisfied with your purchased product. If you are not satisfied with the product, you can apply for return.
terms: Support 7-day no-reason returns
Product must be kept in original packaging and unused
Please provide purchase receipt or order number
Return shipping fee borne by buyer, unless product quality issue
Refund will be processed within 7 business days after receiving returned product and inspection
Customized products do not support returns
returnPolicy.note: For detailed return policy, please refer to our Return Policy page.

userConduct.title: User Conduct Guidelines
userConduct.description: When using this Website, you agree not to engage in the following behaviors:
prohibitions: Uploading or transmitting any illegal, harmful, threatening, defamatory, harassing, obscene or other offensive content
Impersonating any person or entity, or misrepresenting your relationship with any person or entity
Forging headers or otherwise manipulating identifiers to conceal the origin of any content transmitted through the Website
Uploading or transmitting any content you do not have right to transmit under any law or contract
Uploading or transmitting any content that infringes any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright or other proprietary rights
Interfering with or disrupting the Website or any servers or networks connected to the Website
Intentionally or unintentionally violating any applicable local, national or international law
Collecting or storing others' personal data without explicit consent
userConduct.consequence: Violation of these conduct guidelines may result in suspension or termination of your account.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The Website and all its content, features and functionality are the exclusive property of Ya Yun Tea & Spirits and its licensors, protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws.
rights: No copying, modifying, reproducing, distributing or otherwise using Website content without prior written permission
Unauthorized use of Website content may violate copyright law, trademark law and other laws
Trademarks, service marks and logos on the Website are property of Ya Yun Tea & Spirits or its licensors
You must not use any trademark or service mark without prior written permission

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, this Website is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis, without any express or implied warranties.
disclaimers: We do not guarantee the Website will be uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free
We do not guarantee products, information, services or other materials on the Website will meet your requirements
We do not guarantee any errors on the Website will be corrected
We are not liable for any damages arising from use or inability to use the Website
We are not liable for computer equipment damage or data loss from any materials or data downloaded from the Website due to use of the Website

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: In no event shall Ya Yun Tea & Spirits or its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.
exclusions: Including but not limited to loss of profits, loss of data, loss of goodwill or other intangible losses
Whether or not advised of the possibility of such damages
Regardless of theory of liability (contract, tort or otherwise)
Even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages
limitationOfLiability.cap: In no event shall our total liability exceed the amount you paid for the service or product giving rise to the claim.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: If you have any disputes about the Website or our services, please contact us through customer service first. We will strive to resolve any issues amicably.
terms: All disputes should be resolved through amicable negotiation
If negotiation fails, disputes should be submitted to competent court
These Terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China
The competent court for any disputes is the Chaoyang District People's Court, Beijing

termsChanges.title: Terms Changes
termsChanges.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modified terms will take effect immediately upon posting on this website.
terms: We will post new Terms on this page
Update 'Last Updated' date
For significant changes, we may notify you via email
Continued use of the Website means you accept the modified Terms
termsChanges.note: If you do not agree with the modified Terms, you should stop using the Website.

severability.title: Severability
description: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, that provision shall be enforced to the maximum extent permitted by law and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
Invalid or unenforceable provision should not affect the validity and enforceability of these Terms.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.description: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the Website.
terms: Superseding all prior agreements, communications and understandings
Whether written or oral
Relating to the subject matter of the Website
entireAgreement.note: Your use of the Website is also subject to our Privacy Policy and Return Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or comments about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
contact.note: We will reply as soon as possible after receiving your inquiry.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Ya Yun Tea & Spirits (hereinafter referred to as 'we', 'Website') attaches great importance to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy is intended to explain to you how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information. Use of the Website means you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
introduction.commitment: We are committed to protecting your personal information and taking reasonable security measures to prevent unauthorized access, use or disclosure.

personalInfo.title: 1. Personal Information
items: Payment information (processed through secure third-party payment gateway)
Personal profile information such as date of birth, gender

usageInfo.title: 2. Usage Information
items: Browsing history and product viewing records

informationUsage.title: Information Usage
informationUsage.description: We use collected information for the following purposes:
purposes: Processing orders: Processing, delivering and tracking your orders
Providing customer service: Responding to your inquiries and support requests
Personalized experience: Recommending products based on your preferences
Sending notifications: Order updates, promotional activities and marketing information
Improving services: Analyzing usage data to optimize website functionality
Security protection: Preventing fraud and abuse
Legal compliance: Complying with legal and regulatory requirements

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We will not sell, rent or trade your personal information. We only share information in the following cases:
cases: Service providers: Sharing with third-party service providers helping us operate business (such as payment processing, logistics delivery, data analysis)
Legal requirements: Disclosing pursuant to legal requirements or to protect our rights
Business transfer: In case of merger, acquisition or asset transfer
With your consent: After obtaining your explicit consent
informationSharing.note: We require all third-party service providers to comply with strict confidentiality standards and only allow them to access your information when necessary to perform services.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights: Right to access: Request a copy of information we hold about you
Right to correct: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Right to delete: Request deletion of your personal information
Right to restrict processing: Restrict how we process your information
Right to data portability: Receive your information in a structured format
Right to object: Object to our processing of your information
Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw your consent to processing at any time
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@teaspirits.com. We will respond to your request within a reasonable time.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take the following measures to protect your information:
measures: Using SSL encryption technology to protect data transmission
Implementing access control and authentication mechanisms
Conducting regular security audits and vulnerability scanning
Restricting employee access to personal information
dataSecurity.disclaimer: Although we strive to protect your information, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: We use Cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze website usage and provide personalized content.
types: Essential Cookies: Necessary for normal website operation
cookiePolicy.note: You can manage Cookie preferences through browser settings, but this may affect some website functionality.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
description: This Website is not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information of children under 13. If we discover we have inadvertently collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.
If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided personal information to us, please contact us and we will take appropriate measures.

policyChanges.title: Policy Changes
description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. After changes, we will post the new Privacy Policy on the website and update the 'Last Updated' date.
For significant changes, we will notify you via email or website notification. Continued use of our services means you accept the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions, comments or requests about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
contact.note: We will reply as soon as possible after receiving your request, usually within 30 days.
